message: Hello Bob, I believe this product has the potential to be incredibly valuable to you. I'm happy to discuss pricing, but given its worth, I'm initially suggesting $1,150,000.
Thank you for considering my interest in the product, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $1,100,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,150,000 is truly my bottom line to make this work.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.
